abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 50         INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN FREEMAN  BOSLEY SR.  	An ordinance recommended by the Parking Commission making appropriation for payment of the operating expenses, capital equipment and improvement expenses, including lease purchase agreements involving Parking Division assets, and debt service expenses of the Parking Division of the Treasurer?s Office, Kiel Parking Facilities, Argyle Parking Facility, Chouteau Parking Facility, Williams Paper Parking Facility, Central Downtown Parking Facility, Buckingham Parking Facility, Cupples Parking Facility and Justice Parking Facility for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 2012 and ending June 30, 2013, amounting in the aggregate to the sum of Fourteen Million, Twenty Seven Thousand, Forty Two Dollars ($14,027,042) and containing an emergency clause.
